#summary Modification, in the patch, to the original paper
#labels Phase-Design

= Introduction =

The derby patch has slightly been modified from the implementation used in the paper.

= Details =

  * ConcurrentHashMap is used for _tbl_ field in BufferCache, instead of org.cliffc.high_scale_lib.NonBlockingHashMap
  * ArrayBlockingQueue is used for _queue_ field in BackgroundDirtyPageWriter, instead of BoundedTransferQueue
  * AtomicReferenceArray is used for _pool_ field in GClockBuffer, instead of VolatileArray
